Name: Doug Ransdell
Title: Designer
About:
I’m a proud graduate of Appalachian State and a North Carolina native. I like the challenge of creating online and offline user experiences from scratch. 

I’ve helped to build scalable and dynamic websites, intranets, web portals, and applications for a range of clients including: PBS, The U.S. State Department, George Washington University, Nemours Health System, The Institute of International Education, Marriott Hotels, and Nextel. I even got to design the logo for the U.S. House of Representatives.

When I’m not working, I enjoy going to baseball games, fantasy football, spoiling my dog, and grilling things on my back porch.
